content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4.15 - Executive order no. 15: establishing an interagency task force on acquired immune deficiency syndrome (aids)

State Regulations
A nationwide outbreak of Acquired Immune Deficiency

Syndrome (AIDS) has affected more than 1,350 persons and caused more than 450
deaths in the United States, a mortality rate of over 33 percent, with one half
of all cases in the United States reported from this State. The causative agent for AIDS is unknown. Ongoing national
surveillance for AIDS cases is being conducted by the Centers for Disease

Control in cooperation with State and local health departments. In New York

State, case registries are being developed through the combined efforts of

State and local governments. In light of the need to strengthen State efforts to combat
this disease and by virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution
and Laws of the State of New York, I, Mario M. Cuomo, Governor of the State of

New York, do hereby establish an Interagency Task Force on Acquired Immune

Deficiency Syndrome. I. Membership

The members of the Task Force shall consist of the

Commissioner of Health, who will chair the Task Force, the Commissioners of

Social Services, Correctional Services and Mental Health, the Superintendent of

Insurance, the Director of the Division of Substance Abuse Services, the

Chairman of the Commission on Corrections, and the Director of the Division for

Youth. II. Power and

Responsibilities

The Task Force shall: coordinate the public and private efforts in the fight
against AIDS; disseminate to the public the best possible information
available concerning the proper modes of prevention, diagnosis, treatment and
follow-up care for the disease; monitor the extent and nature of the disease in this

State; encourage research efforts of medical centers, universities, nonprofit organizations and research centers in the etiology of
the underlying immune deficiencies identified in AIDS cases; and submit a
preliminary report by December 1983 and at six-month intervals
thereafter. III. Assistance
to the Task Force

All departments, divisions, boards, offices and public
corporations of the State are requested to cooperate with the Task Force and to
provide such assistance as the Task Force may request to fulfill its
purposes. Signed: Mario M. CuomoDated: May 16, 1983
